channel.title: Games you would like to see a sequel for
channel.description:
Personally, do you know what game i think needs a sequel, [b]Jet Set Radio Future[/b], it had good graphics, good gameplay, and awesome music (J-Pop fans anyone), that game was released back in 2002, and i think it's about time for a new Jet Set Radio game.
What other game do [b]you[/b] think needs a sequel?

item.title: Games you would like to see a sequel for
item.dc:creator: Ond_kaja
item.description:
Kisuke Moto:

I want the original sequel to HL 2. Since it got hacked before it came out, it’s been changed and a lot of parts were missing in the game. Episode 1 and 2 along with 3 were basically in it already. and Raven home was a lot darker and scarier looking plus longer and when Valve was talking about the combine sucking up all the water in the world, they meant it. I mean all the water was literally dried up. Here in the original, HL 2 don’t seemed to have lost much water. Only a little dried but still a lot of water.

Ya hear what I’m saying? This is what I would have hoped they could have done.

Greatest Respects!

They changed the style before the leak.

Read full topic

item.description:
I want the original sequel to HL 2. Since it got hacked before it came out, it’s been changed and a lot of parts were missing in the game. Episode 1 and 2 along with 3 were basically in it already. and Raven home was a lot darker and scarier looking plus longer and when Valve was talking about the combine sucking up all the water in the world, they meant it. I mean all the water was literally dried up. Here in the original, HL 2 don’t seemed to have lost much water. Only a little dried but still a lot of water.

Ya hear what I’m saying? This is what I would have hoped they could have done.

item.source: Games you would like to see a sequel for

item.title: Games you would like to see a sequel for
item.dc:creator: mrfohlin
item.description:
danielsangeo:

Okay, this one is going to sound weird, but I want a sequel to the original Donkey Kong. Before Bowser kidnapped Mario’s girl, a barrel-throwing ape kept her hostage. Since Donkey Kong, there hasn’t been a Mario-Kong game where Mario is the protagonist and DK is the antagonist. In fact, since the original Donkey Kong, the ape was a good guy (even in the actual DK sequel “Donkey Kong Jr”). I want to see him as the villain once again.

I don’t know what kind of game it should be, but a sequel to the premise of the original Donkey Kong would be awesome…at least, to me.

Even though he’s the villian, I don’t see it as a true sequel.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you would like to see a sequel for
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
Jet Force Gemini. Its control scheme, with some tweaks, would actually be a perfect combination of platformer any-direction movement. Then, just have one button to switch to an FPS mode. In the original, it put the camera directly behind you, changed your controls to a strafing-mode, and faded your character to 1% opacity. Plus, it automatically set to that for boss fights.

Read full topic

item.description:
Dungeon Keeper and Evil Genius…

bigfan421:

an Aliens Vs Predator where the Playable marines don’t have technology that is an inversion of the original thing JUST to satiate Right handed players.
PULSE RIFLE IS LEFT Handed not right sega, geez get it right for once.

Sounds good to me.

item.source: Games you would like to see a sequel for

item.title: Games you would like to see a sequel for
item.dc:creator: busterofwar
item.description:
My most wanted sequels at the moment are Half-Life 2: Episode 3, Portal 2 and sequels to both Mass Effect 2 and Dragon Age. Although I would also love a sequel to Fahrenheit/Indigo Prophecy, a new addition to the Legacy of Kain series, Devil May Cry 5 and Resident Evil 6.
Also I would like a new Rainbow Six, Ghost Recon and another old fashioned Splinter Cell, however I currently hate Ubisoft for their lack of care for PC gamers and am not currently buying any of their games.

Read full topic

Fallout 3 (Fallout: New Vegas Isn’t a sequel)
Mortal Kombat Armagedon

That’s about all…

Demons Souls. I want customizable armors, better matchmaking, more dungeons and more armors period. There has to be a reason for me to want to wear heavy fucking cumbersome armor and roll very slowly. It’s fucking useless.
